description: The ‘73 Skyline graphic riffs on a label they sewed on Patagonia gear back in the day. Fast-forward to now, and Patagonia's in business to save their home planet. Conserving resources is one way to help, so this everyday-weight T-shirt is made with fabric scraps and recycled bottles and reduces their reliance on virgin materials. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia 73 Skyline Uprisal Crew Sweatshirt - Unisex

specs.value: 11.5-oz 55% postconsumer recycled polyester, 45% recycled cotton knit fleece with a brushed back
